Title: If you add `set path+=**5` to your vimrc then suddenly `gf` works how you'd want with site-packages ...
Author: Jake Koenig
Summary: If you add `set path+=**5` to your vimrc then suddenly `gf` works how you'd want with site-packages and node_modules e.g. when my cursor is on anthropic.types on the import line `gf` takes me to the directory `venv/lib/python3.12/site-packages/anthropic/types/`
